“apa siyalu denama kamathi wela thibuna merata thula sthira deshapalana wisadumak athiwela thibena welawe eltitiyath ee mohothe apath samaga sitiyanam kiya.eeta hethuwa thamayi katawath amathaka karanna ba eltitieeya sidukala aragalaya pitupasa sadarana hethuwak thibuna eya yuddhaya siduwanawitadi pawa parlimenthuwa thuladi kiwwa aragalaya athi wuuwata pasuwa owungen waradi siduwela athi namuth aragalaya aarambhayedi ehi sadaranathwayak thibuna ada demala janathawage jathika gataluwata sadharana deshapalana wisadumak labadiya yuthuyi kiyana karanaya merata rajayath jathyanthara prajawath piligannawanam ehi arthaya thamayi ee aragalaya pitupasa thibunu sadharanathwaya owun piliaragena kiyana eka”(wathman wipaksha nayaka 2016apriyal 16wana dina sidukarana lada prakashayaki)

alawwa dumriya sthanayedi pereda (17) siduwu dumriya anathuren wu paduwa dala washayen rupiyal miliyana 750 k bawa prawahana amathi kumara welgama mahatha pawasayi.anathurata hethuwa nishchithawama methek heli wi nathi athara siddhiya pilibanda karunu soya balimata wishesha kamituwak pathkara parikshana arambaa athi bawa prawahana amathiwaraya sandahan keleya.parikshanayedi dumriya palaka madiriya kriya kala aakarayath, sangnya paddhathiya kriyathmaka wu aakaraya pilibandath wishesha awadhanaya yomukarana bawa da riyadurange athapasuwim ha dumriya sthanadhipathiwarayage kriyadamaya da soya balana bawa hethema awadharanaya kaleya.amathi welgama mahatha eeye (17) rathri dumriya anathura siduwu sthanayata gos karunu soya balimen pasu rogin athulu kara athi alawwa ha kurunagala rohal wetha gos thuwala wuwan pilibanda soya baliya.rohal deke rogingen rogi thaththwaya pilibanda karunu wimasu amathyawaraya, roginta awashya kadinam prathikara laba dena lesath, rogin sambandhayen wishesha yamak kala yuthu we nam ee sambandhayen thamata danum dena lesa amathyawaraya rohal baladharingen illa sitiyeya.mema anathura sambandhayen sidukaranu labana parikshana wartha ha kisiyam pudgalayekuge waradakin meya siduwuye nam ee sambandhayen dadi winayanukula piyawarak ganna bawa prakasha kala amathyawaraya, miyagiya ayage pawulwala gnyathinta dadi shokaya prakasha karamin roginta ikman suwaya labewayi da prarthana kaleya.dumriya samanyadhikari bi. ee. pi. aariyarathna, dumriya ni.samanyadhikari (meheyum) nalaka , gamanagamana adhikari rathnayaka mahathwaru athulu pirisak da amathyawaraya samanga me awasthawata ekwuha..
